game.name: Land Of Idyllic Beauty
game.genres: Casual, Indie, RPG, Simulation, Strategy, Early Access
game.shortDescription: Welcome to "Land Of Idyllic Beauty" a simulation management game that combines farming, store management, supply chain management, and romance elements. Experience the beauty of the idyllic life, starting from a small plot of farmland, gradually building your agricultural and commercial empire!
